original_text: I will make myself yet more contemptible than this, and I will be abased in your eyes. But by the female servants of whom you have spoken, by them I shall be held in honor.”
korean_text: 내가 이보다 더 낮아져서 스스로 천하게 보일지라도 네가 말한 바 계집종에게는 내가 높임을 받으리라 한지라

sentences.original_text: I will make myself yet more contemptible than this
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이것보다 더 경멸스럽게 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: and I will be abased in your eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 너희 눈에 비천하게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: by them I shall be held in honor
